name: Todoroki, Half-Hot Half-Cold
text:
Vigilance. Whenever Todoroki, Half-Hot Half-Cold deals combat damage to a player, choose one - 
• Todoroki deals damage equal to his power to target creature an opponent controls. 
• Create a 2/2 red and white Elemental creature token with haste named "Inferno".
flavorText: "I'll surpass you, and be the number one hero!" - Todoroki
